\n</div>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 08 Dec 2020 00:00:00 +0000","feedId":44,"bgimg":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/8e/Edge-a-Lawn-Step-1-Version-5.jpg/aid1332841-v4-728px-Edge-a-Lawn-Step-1-Version-5.jpg","linkMd5":"a3aa5b52274d8227c9d1dfeda9985dbc","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn32@2020_3/2020/12/11/08-00-31-831_f206abbc6ba0cf08.webp","destWidth":728,"destHeight":546,"sourceBytes":52421,"destBytes":30658,"author":"","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/8e/Edge-a-Lawn-Step-1-Version-5.jpg/aid1332841-v4-728px-Edge-a-Lawn-Step-1-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn32@2020_3/2020/12/11/08-00-31-831_f206abbc6ba0cf08.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/be/Edge-a-Lawn-Step-2-Version-5.jpg/aid1332841-v4-728px-Edge-a-Lawn-Step-2-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn93@2020_2/2020/12/11/08-01-07-953_f02bfb7dc24a464b.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/b2/Edge-a-Lawn-Step-3-Version-5.jpg/aid1332841-v4-728px-Edge-a-Lawn-Step-3-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn15@2020_3/2020/12/11/08-00-54-504_098b0344ccc1a673.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/37/Edge-a-Lawn-Step-4-Version-5.jpg/aid1332841-v4-728px-Edge-a-Lawn-Step-4-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn99@2020_3/2020/12/11/08-01-03-554_b7817ae21a5ff12f.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/6e/Edge-a-Lawn-Step-5-Version-5.jpg/aid1332841-v4-728px-Edge-a-Lawn-Step-5-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn61@2020_3/2020/12/11/08-01-01-861_8e2dc2475e1e19d8.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/a2/Edge-a-Lawn-Step-6-Version-5.jpg/aid1332841-v4-728px-Edge-a-Lawn-Step-6-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn65@2020_4/2020/12/11/08-01-01-623_5c7382fddf62322a.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/bf/Edge-a-Lawn-Step-7-Version-5.jpg/aid1332841-v4-728px-Edge-a-Lawn-Step-7-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn86@2020_1/2020/12/11/08-00-56-096_2c2d9bd8042c9cff.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/6/67/Edge-a-Lawn-Step-8-Version-5.jpg/aid1332841-v4-728px-Edge-a-Lawn-Step-8-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn15@2020_1/2020/12/11/08-01-02-398_fd0eb0e39e8fdd2a.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/8a/Edge-a-Lawn-Step-9-Version-5.jpg/aid1332841-v4-728px-Edge-a-Lawn-Step-9-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn91@2020_2/2020/12/11/08-01-08-918_7735a9fb340f728c.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/50/Edge-a-Lawn-Step-10-Version-5.jpg/aid1332841-v4-728px-Edge-a-Lawn-Step-10-Version-5.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn61@2020_6/2020/12/11/08-01-04-060_25109aefd2ebaf5f.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/ee/Edge-a-Lawn-Step-11.jpg/aid1332841-v4-728px-Edge-a-Lawn-Step-11.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn13@2020_3/2020/12/11/08-00-54-446_7dd8c70a4d132953.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1607673631399},{"createdTime":"2020-12-11 16:00:31","updatedTime":"2020-12-11 16:00:31","title":"How to Celebrate Your Birthday in Quarantine","link":"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine","description":"<div class=\"mw-parser-output\">\n <p>Birthdays are all about fun and celebration, which can be pretty hard to come by during the COVID-19 pandemic. Don’t worry—there are plenty of ways you can enjoy your special day, even if your options are a little more limited than they usually are. Pick and choose from this birthday list and see what options work best for you! </p> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine&amp;action=edit&amp;section=1\" title=\"Edit section: Steps\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Steps\">Steps</span></h2> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine&amp;action=edit&amp;section=2\" title=\"Edit section: Host a virtual birthday party.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Host-a-virtual-birthday-party.\">Host a virtual birthday party.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Invite your friends and family members to “stop by” at a certain time. Host a call over a video-sharing platform, like Zoom or Skype, and let your loved ones know when they can join the fun. Digital birthday parties are great for people of all ages, and a fun and safe way to stay connected on your special day.<sup id=\"_ref-1\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 1\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-1\">[1]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-1-Version-3.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Celebrate Your Birthday in Quarantine Step 1 Version 3.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/30/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-1-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-1-Version-3.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>A virtual happy hour might also be up your alley.</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine&amp;action=edit&amp;section=3\" title=\"Edit section: Play virtual games with friends.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Play-virtual-games-with-friends.\">Play virtual games with friends.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Create a custom trivia game with your loved ones. Ask your friends and relatives to come up with special questions about you, which will serve as the “trivia.” Host a video call on your special day, then go around in a circle and quiz each other with the different trivia questions, and see who comes out the victor.<sup id=\"_ref-2\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 2\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-2\">[2]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-2-Version-3.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Celebrate Your Birthday in Quarantine Step 2 Version 3.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/22/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-2-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-2-Version-3.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Charades are another fun game to play with friends—plus, they’re great for birthday parties of all ages!</li> \n    <li>Online games are another fun way to bring everyone together! <i>Jackbox Games</i>, <i>Heads Up!</i>, and <i>Minecraft</i> are some great ways to stay connected on your special day.</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine&amp;action=edit&amp;section=4\" title=\"Edit section: Schedule a drive-by birthday celebration.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Schedule-a-drive-by-birthday-celebration.\">Schedule a drive-by birthday celebration.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Pick a time and empty parking lot where people can meet. Encourage people to park at the lot and line up their cars in a circle, while practicing social distancing. After you arrive, everyone can crank up the car speakers and play “Happy Birthday” for you!<sup id=\"_ref-3\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 3\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-3\">[3]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-3-Version-3.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Celebrate Your Birthday in Quarantine Step 3 Version 3.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/28/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-3-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-3-Version-3.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>You can also have a line of cars drive by your home on your special day, like a parade.</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine&amp;action=edit&amp;section=5\" title=\"Edit section: Hold a digital movie night.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Hold-a-digital-movie-night.\">Hold a digital movie night.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Invite your loved ones to marathon some of your favorite movies. Apps like “Netflix Party” let you host and watch movies together, even if everyone’s stuck at home. Pick out a fun movie that you can watch while relaxing and kicking back with your friends.<sup id=\"_ref-4\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 4\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-4\">[4]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-4-Version-3.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Celebrate Your Birthday in Quarantine Step 4 Version 3.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/38/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-4-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-4-Version-3.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Unfortunately, “Netflix Party” is limited to movies on Netflix. Amazon Watch Party, Metastream, and Scener are also great options.<sup id=\"_ref-5\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 5\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-5\">[5]</a></sup></li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine&amp;action=edit&amp;section=6\" title=\"Edit section: Get takeout.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Get-takeout.\">Get takeout.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Browse a delivery app to see what restaurants are in your area. Pick out whatever food you’re craving, and order it to be delivered straight to your door. Order this food around lunch or dinner, so you can enjoy your favorite food as a special birthday meal!<sup id=\"_ref-6\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 6\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-6\">[6]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-5-Version-3.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Celebrate Your Birthday in Quarantine Step 5 Version 3.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e2/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-5-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-5-Version-3.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine&amp;action=edit&amp;section=7\" title=\"Edit section: Decorate your home.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Decorate-your-home.\">Decorate your home.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Hang up decorations all over your home so you feel festive. Blow up some balloons and dangle some streamers—use whatever you have lying around, or drop by a party store to pick up some new supplies. If your home looks really festive, you’re sure to feel really festive, too.<sup id=\"_ref-7\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 7\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-7\">[7]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-6-Version-3.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Celebrate Your Birthday in Quarantine Step 6 Version 3.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/45/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-6-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-6-Version-3.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>If you’d really like to get in the spirit of quarantine, use toilet paper as streamers instead.</li> \n    <li>You can also put up a birthday yard sign, so your neighbors know that it’s your special day.<sup id=\"_ref-8\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 8\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-8\">[8]</a></sup></li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine&amp;action=edit&amp;section=8\" title=\"Edit section: Get a birthday cake delivered.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Get-a-birthday-cake-delivered.\">Get a birthday cake delivered.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Browse online for your dream birthday cake. Look through local bakeries and sweet shops and see what they have available. Schedule for the cake to arrive on your special day, so you don’t have to worry about baking a cake from scratch at home.<sup id=\"_ref-9\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 9\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-9\">[9]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-7-Version-2.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Celebrate Your Birthday in Quarantine Step 7 Version 2.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/76/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-7-Version-2.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-7-Version-2.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>You can also whip up your own cake from scratch!</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine&amp;action=edit&amp;section=9\" title=\"Edit section: Create an online wishlist.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Create-an-online-wishlist.\">Create an online wishlist.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Organize everything you’d like on a wishlist. Use a digital platform like Amazon to collect all of your gift ideas in 1 place. Pick out some gift ideas that are great for being stuck at home, like noise-cancelling headphones, a cozy throw blanket, gift cards, special candles, and more. Send this link to your friends and loved ones, so they all know what you want for your birthday!<sup id=\"_ref-10\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 10\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-10\">[10]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-8-Version-3.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Celebrate Your Birthday in Quarantine Step 8 Version 3.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/52/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-8-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-8-Version-3.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine&amp;action=edit&amp;section=10\" title=\"Edit section: Invite your friends to stop by your home.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Invite-your-friends-to-stop-by-your-home.\">Invite your friends to stop by your home.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Say hi to your friends at a distance. Invite your pals to stop by your home and wave from your front yard or porch. This is a great way to see your loved ones on your special day while still keeping a safe distance!<sup id=\"_ref-11\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 11\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-11\">[11]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-9-Version-3.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Celebrate Your Birthday in Quarantine Step 9 Version 3.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/8a/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-9-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-9-Version-3.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>As a special touch, your friends can drop off gifts and treats on your front porch.<sup id=\"_ref-12\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 12\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-12\">[12]</a></sup></li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine&amp;action=edit&amp;section=11\" title=\"Edit section: Give yourself a homemade spa day.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Give-yourself-a-homemade-spa-day.\">Give yourself a homemade spa day.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Relax and unwind with a delightful bath. Browse online for some spa essentials, like bath salts, scented candles, face masks, and good reading material. Draw yourself a warm bath, and give yourself as much time as you need to chill out in the tub.<sup id=\"_ref-13\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 13\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-13\">[13]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-10-Version-3.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Celebrate Your Birthday in Quarantine Step 10 Version 3.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/fc/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-10-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-10-Version-3.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine&amp;action=edit&amp;section=12\" title=\"Edit section: Dress up for your special day.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Dress-up-for-your-special-day.\">Dress up for your special day.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Wear your favorite outfit even if you aren’t going out. Go through your wardrobe and search for your favorite clothes—this might be a special dress, a nice suit, or anything that makes you look and feel your very best. If you’re interested, freshen up with a bit of makeup. It’s your special day, and you deserve to look the part!<sup id=\"_ref-14\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 14\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-14\">[14]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-11-Version-3.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Celebrate Your Birthday in Quarantine Step 11 Version 3.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e5/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-11-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-11-Version-3.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine&amp;action=edit&amp;section=13\" title=\"Edit section: Dance around your home.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Dance-around-your-home.\">Dance around your home.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Create a special party playlist you can jam out to. Broadcast the music on your phone or some portable speakers and rock out to the music! You don’t need to have an official party to bust out some killer dance moves. If you live with other people, invite them to get in on your dance party, too.<sup id=\"_ref-15\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 15\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-15\">[15]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-12-Version-3.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Celebrate Your Birthday in Quarantine Step 12 Version 3.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/8d/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-12-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-12-Version-3.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Go all out for your impromptu dance party by shifting the furniture around.</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine&amp;action=edit&amp;section=14\" title=\"Edit section: Go to a virtual concert with your friends.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Go-to-a-virtual-concert-with-your-friends.\">Go to a virtual concert with your friends.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Check online to see what bands are hosting a livestream online. Give your friends a time to log on, and enjoy lots of live music together! There are a lot of different options you can choose from, depending on your interests.<sup id=\"_ref-16\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 16\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-16\">[16]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-13-Version-3.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Celebrate Your Birthday in Quarantine Step 13 Version 3.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/cb/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-13-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-13-Version-3.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>For instance, groups like the Metropolitan Opera and Royal Albert Hall host several livestream events.</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine&amp;action=edit&amp;section=15\" title=\"Edit section: Host a video game birthday party.\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Host-a-video-game-birthday-party.\">Host a video game birthday party.</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Invite your gaming friends over for an in-game celebration. Host a party in an open-world game that a lot of your friends play. Invite them over to your “realm” on your special day, so all your avatars can digitally celebrate together!<sup id=\"_ref-17\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 17\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-17\">[17]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-14-Version-3.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Celebrate Your Birthday in Quarantine Step 14 Version 3.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c3/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-14-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-14-Version-3.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"546\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Games from the <i>Animal Crossing</i> franchise make a big deal out of your birthday. You can even send out party invites using the in-game post office.</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine&amp;action=edit&amp;section=16\" title=\"Edit section: Tips\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Tips\">Tips</span></h2> \n <ul>\n  <li>To get in the spirit of things, ask your friends and relatives to send over quarantine-themed birthday cards to your home.<sup id=\"_ref-18\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 18\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-18\">[18]</a></sup></li> \n  <li>Treat yourself with a special food basket or gift box! Schedule it so that it arrives at your home on your big day.<sup id=\"_ref-19\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 19\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine#_note-19\">[19]</a></sup></li>\n </ul> \n <p><br /> </p> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine&amp;action=edit&amp;section=17\" title=\"Edit section: References\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"References\">References</span></h2>\n <div class=\"mw-references-wrap +0000","feedId":44,"bgimg":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/30/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-1-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-1-Version-3.jpg","linkMd5":"c8a74fc867ab9d0b7b37a9e19bb82cb5","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn87@2020_1/2020/12/11/08-00-31-836_b9aca55a89319b46.webp","destWidth":728,"destHeight":546,"sourceBytes":62178,"destBytes":38122,"author":"","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/30/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-1-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-1-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn87@2020_1/2020/12/11/08-00-31-836_b9aca55a89319b46.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/22/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-2-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-2-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn45@2020_1/2020/12/11/08-01-02-726_a45503adae44ec9b.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/28/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-3-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-3-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn86@2020_5/2020/12/11/08-00-57-515_8fe1337bcda933ad.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/38/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-4-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-4-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn16@2020_4/2020/12/11/08-01-09-071_fc82aba1ec2fc593.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e2/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-5-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-5-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn50@2020_6/2020/12/11/08-01-02-702_af338bb35fdcd27a.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/45/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-6-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-6-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn53@2020_3/2020/12/11/08-01-00-183_f7c0b7f6659fa2cc.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/76/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-7-Version-2.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-7-Version-2.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn65@2020_2/2020/12/11/08-01-08-543_c04e9856d3c8d771.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/52/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-8-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-8-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn27@2020_2/2020/12/11/08-01-06-149_19377d035b94c68d.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/8a/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-9-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-9-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn53@2020_5/2020/12/11/08-01-05-353_5b2a0e43ab244ff6.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/fc/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-10-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-10-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn4@2020_2/2020/12/11/08-01-02-086_471f0dbc090c4767.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e5/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-11-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-11-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn56@2020_1/2020/12/11/08-01-06-688_7f82e4602b4b414a.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/8d/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-12-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-12-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn33@2020_3/2020/12/11/08-01-07-050_993a3bdc94c6f804.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/cb/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-13-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-13-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn32@2020_4/2020/12/11/08-01-09-211_af83408a7691897c.webp","https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c3/Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-14-Version-3.jpg/aid12261297-v4-728px-Celebrate-Your-Birthday-in-Quarantine-Step-14-Version-3.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn22@2020_2/2020/12/11/08-01-01-053_1f290bf2d2e6db3f.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1607673631415},{"createdTime":"2020-12-11 16:00:31","updatedTime":"2020-12-11 16:00:31","title":"How to Make Dreidel Marshmallow Pops","link":"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops","description":"<div class=\"mw-parser-output\">\n <p>Marshmallow dreidel pops are colorful and festive treats perfect for a Chanukah party! Dreidel pops are made by sticking a Hershey’s kiss to the bottom of a marshmallow, then piercing the top of the marshmallow with a pretzel stick to give it the shape of a spinning top. After making the basic form of the dreidel pops, you can decorate them by coating them in blue candy melts, then adding on the Hebrew letters so that they look like real dreidels! Because marshmallow dreidel pops require minimal cooking and are easy to assemble, they are the perfect activity to do with a child to teach them more about Chanukah and the game of dreidel! </p> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops&amp;action=edit&amp;section=1\" title=\"Edit section: Ingredients\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Ingredients\">Ingredients</span></h2> \n <ul>\n  <li>12 large marshmallows</li> \n  <li>12 thin pretzel sticks</li> \n  <li>12 Hershey’s Kisses</li> \n  <li>1 package of blue candy melts</li> \n  <li>1 bar of white chocolate</li>\n </ul> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops&amp;action=edit&amp;section=2\" title=\"Edit section: Steps\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Steps\">Steps</span></h2> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops&amp;action=edit&amp;section=3\" title=\"Edit section: Making the Base of the Marshmallow Dreidels\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Making-the-Base-of-the-Marshmallow-Dreidels\">Making the Base of the Marshmallow Dreidels</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Stick pretzels into the marshmallows. To begin making the marshmallow dreidels, take one of your thin pretzel sticks and stick it into the flat side of a marshmallow, pressing it into the marshmallow until it is about ¾ of the way through the marshmallow. Make sure that it is pressed far into the marshmallow, but doesn’t fully pierce through it.<sup id=\"_ref-1\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 1\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops#_note-1\">[1]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-1.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Dreidel Marshmallow Pops Step 1.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/2e/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-1.jpg/aid8358388-v4-728px-Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-1.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"485\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Use short, thin pretzel sticks as opposed to large, thick ones.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Melt a square of white chocolate. Break off one square of white chocolate from the bar, then place the square in a microwaveable bowl and microwave it for 20 seconds or until melted.<sup id=\"_ref-2\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 2\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops#_note-2\">[2]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-2.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Dreidel Marshmallow Pops Step 2.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/49/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-2.jpg/aid8358388-v4-728px-Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-2.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"485\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div></li> \n  <li>Dip a Hershey’s kiss in the white chocolate. Unwrap a Hershey’s kiss, then dip the bottom in the white chocolate. Only use enough chocolate to coat the bottom of the kiss.<sup id=\"_ref-3\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 3\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops#_note-3\">[3]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-3.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Dreidel Marshmallow Pops Step 3.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c3/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-3.jpg/aid8358388-v4-728px-Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-3.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"485\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>The white chocolate will act as a kind of edible glue that will stick the Hershey’s kiss to the marshmallow.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Attach the Hershey’s kiss to the marshmallow. After you dip the bottom of the Hershey’s kiss in the chocolate, press the sticky side of the Hershey’s kiss into the bottom of a marshmallow, the flat side opposite from the side with the pretzel. Press the Hershey’s kiss against the marshmallow for around 15-20 seconds to help it stick in place.<sup id=\"_ref-4\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 4\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops#_note-4\">[4]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-4.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Dreidel Marshmallow Pops Step 4.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/7/7d/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-4.jpg/aid8358388-v4-728px-Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-4.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"485\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Repeat the process of dipping the Hershey’s kisses in the chocolate, then sticking them to the bottom of the marshmallows.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Freeze the dreidels for 15 minutes. After you have finished sticking the kisses to the marshmallows, place the dreidels on a plate or a baking sheet and put them in the freezer for 15 minutes. Freezing the dreidel pops will help them set so that the Hershey’s kisses stay stuck to the bottom of the marshmallows.<sup id=\"_ref-5\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 5\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops#_note-5\">[5]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-5.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Dreidel Marshmallow Pops Step 5.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f5/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-5.jpg/aid8358388-v4-728px-Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-5.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"485\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops&amp;action=edit&amp;section=4\" title=\"Edit section: Making the Hebrew Letters\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Making-the-Hebrew-Letters\">Making the Hebrew Letters</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Melt the rest of the white chocolate. While the dreidels are in the freezer, you can make the Hebrew letters that adorn the outside of the dreidels. To start making the letters, break the remaining bar of chocolate into squares, then place the squares in a bowl.<sup id=\"_ref-6\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 6\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops#_note-6\">[6]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-6.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Dreidel Marshmallow Pops Step 6.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/96/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-6.jpg/aid8358388-v4-728px-Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-6.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"485\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Microwave the white chocolate in 20-second spurts, taking out the chocolate and stirring it in between each microwave session. Stop microwaving when the chocolate is melted, as over-microwaving can cause the chocolate to scald.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Pour the chocolate into a plastic bag. Wait until the chocolate is around room temperature, then pour it into a plastic sandwich bag. You may have to scrape the bowl to get out all the chocolate. After all the chocolate is in the bag, snip off one of the bottom corners, making a small cut.<sup id=\"_ref-7\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 7\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops#_note-7\">[7]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-7.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Dreidel Marshmallow Pops Step 7.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/95/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-7.jpg/aid8358388-v4-728px-Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-7.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"485\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Cut off only a tiny corner so that the bag can function as a kind of frosting piper.</li> \n    <li>If you have a frosting piper, you can also simply pour the chocolate in the piper bag.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Pipe the Hebrew letters on wax paper. Spread a piece of wax paper on a counter or tabletop. Hold the bag of melted chocolate in both of your hands, then slowly squeeze the bag until the white chocolate starts to come out of the snipped corner in a thin line.\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-8.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Dreidel Marshmallow Pops Step 8.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5c/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-8.jpg/aid8358388-v4-728px-Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-8.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"485\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Pipe out each of the four Hebrew letters that are found on a dreidel: Nun, Gimel, Hey, and Shin. Refer to other dreidels you may have at home or pictures of dreidels online if you are unsure of what these letters look like.<sup id=\"_ref-8\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 8\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops#_note-8\">[8]</a></sup></li> \n    <li>Make 12 sets of the four Hebrew letters. You will eventually stick one set on each of the 12 marshmallow dreidel pops you are making.</li> \n    <li>Nun and Gimel are similar-looking letters, so make sure to add the heel of the Gimel, which differentiates it from the more rounded Nun.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Place the chocolate letters in the freezer. After you finish making all 12 sets of letters, put the wax sheet of letters in the freezer while you work on the dreidels. Freezing them will help the letters to harden.<sup id=\"_ref-9\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 9\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops#_note-9\">[9]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-9.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Dreidel Marshmallow Pops Step 9.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/34/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-9.jpg/aid8358388-v4-728px-Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-9.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"485\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div></li>\n </ol> \n <h3><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops&amp;action=edit&amp;section=5\" title=\"Edit section: Decorating the Marshmallow Dreidels\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Decorating-the-Marshmallow-Dreidels\">Decorating the Marshmallow Dreidels</span></h3> \n <ol>\n  <li>Melt the candy melts. Open the package of candy melts and pour them into a microwaveable bowl. Then microwave them for 1 minute on 50% power. Take the candy melts out from the microwave and stir for about 10 seconds. Then microwave them for 30 seconds on 50% power and stir. Microwave them one more time for 30 seconds on 50% power. Stir the candy melts for 1-2 minutes until they are completely melted.<sup id=\"_ref-10\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 10\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops#_note-10\">[10]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-10.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Dreidel Marshmallow Pops Step 10.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/9a/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-10.jpg/aid8358388-v4-728px-Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-10.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"485\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>You can also melt candy melts in a double boiler. Place an inch (2.54 cm) of water in the bottom of a double boiler, then place the candy melts in the top of the boiler. Place the double boiler on medium heat. Stir the candy melts continuously until they have completely melted.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Add vegetable shortening if necessary. Candy melts often melt into an extremely thick mixture, so thick that if you dipped a spoon into it, the candy melt mixture would glob onto the spoon instead of drip off. If your mixture is extremely thick and hard to stir, add a tablespoon (14.7 ml) of vegetable shortening and stir until the shortening is integrated and the candy melt mixture is smooth.<sup id=\"_ref-11\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 11\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops#_note-11\">[11]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-11.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Dreidel Marshmallow Pops Step 11.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e4/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-11.jpg/aid8358388-v4-728px-Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-11.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"485\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Ideally, if you dip a spoon in the candy melt mixture, you want the mixture to stick to the spoon and slowly drip off.</li> \n    <li>If your candy melt mixture is already the right consistency, you don’t need to add the vegetable shortening.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Dip the marshmallow dreidels in the candy melt mixture. Lay down a piece of wax paper on the counter next to the bowl of candy melt mixture. Take the dreidels out of the freezer and one by one, then dip each dreidel into the blue candy melt.<sup id=\"_ref-12\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 12\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops#_note-12\">[12]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-12.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Dreidel Marshmallow Pops Step 12.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/18/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-12.jpg/aid8358388-v4-728px-Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-12.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"485\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Hold the dreidel by the pretzel handle and dunk it in so that the entire marshmallow and Hershey’s kiss base is submerged.</li> \n    <li>After you dunk the dreidel&nbsp;, take the dreidel out and hold it above the bowl, letting any excess candy melt drip off. Then lay the dreidel down on its side on the sheet of wax paper. Repeat until each dreidel is coated in the blue candy melt!</li> \n    <li>Reserve the excess candy melt.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Let the candy melt set on the dreidels. Set aside the dreidels for about 30 minutes to let the blue candy melt set on the outside of the dreidels. If you want to speed up the process, stick the dreidels in the freezer for about 15 minutes.<sup id=\"_ref-13\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 13\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops#_note-13\">[13]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-13.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Dreidel Marshmallow Pops Step 13.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/57/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-13.jpg/aid8358388-v4-728px-Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-13.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"485\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div></li> \n  <li>Scrape up the chocolate Hebrew letters. While the candy melt sets on the dreidels, take the sheet of chocolate Hebrew letters out of the freezer. Carefully peel the letters from the wax paper with your fingers, or use a knife as a spatula to unstick the letters from the wax paper.\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-14.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Dreidel Marshmallow Pops Step 14.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f6/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-14.jpg/aid8358388-v4-728px-Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-14.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"485\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Take your time unsticking the letters, as they are quite delicate and can easily break.</li>\n   </ul></li> \n  <li>Attach the Hebrew letters to the dreidels. Once you have scraped up the Hebrew letters and the candy melt has set on the dreidels, use a toothpick to transfer some excess candy melt to the back of a Hebrew letter. Then stick the letter on one face of the marshmallow dreidel pop.<sup id=\"_ref-14\" class=\"reference\" aria-label=\"Link to Reference 14\"><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops#_note-14\">[14]</a></sup>\n   <div class=\"mwimg  largeimage  floatcenter \" style=\"max-width:728px\">\n    <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Image:Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-15.jpg\" class=\"image\"><img alt=\"Make Dreidel Marshmallow Pops Step 15.jpg\" src=\"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/9e/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-15.jpg/aid8358388-v4-728px-Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops-Step-15.jpg\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"728\" height=\"485\" class=\"whcdn\" /></a>\n   </div> \n   <ul>\n    <li>Stick the next three letters on the remaining three sides of the dreidel, then carefully set the dreidel on one side and let the letters set.</li> \n    <li>Repeat until all the dreidels have Hebrew letters on each side.</li> \n    <li>Let the dreidels sit for about half an hour so that the letters can set. Then the dreidel pops should be ready to eat!</li>\n   </ul></li>\n </ol> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops&amp;action=edit&amp;section=6\" title=\"Edit section: Tips\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Tips\">Tips</span></h2> \n <ul>\n  <li>You can leave off the step of creating and adding the Hebrew letters if you wish, the marshmallow pop will still look like a dreidel!</li> \n  <li>Learn the game of dreidel and play with your dreidel marshmallow pops!</li>\n </ul> \n <h2><span class=\"mw-editsection\"><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">[</span><a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/index.php?title=Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops&amp;action=edit&amp;section=7\" title=\"Edit section: Souces and Citations\">Edit</a><span class=\"mw-editsection-bracket\">]</span></span><span class=\"mw-headline\" id=\"Souces-and-Citations\">Souces and Citations</span></h2>\n <p> __</p>\n <div href=\"https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Dreidel-Marshmallow-Pops#_ref-9\">↑</a> <span class=\"reference-text\"><a target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer noopener\" class=\"external free\"
